name: Scary Piggy
description:
Welcome to this Piggy Escape Obby game.
Piggy keeps you locked in her house. Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. Piggy hears everything, if you drop something on the floor.
You are in the right place "Piggy Escape Obby" is one of the best reaction games of horror you will enjoy by playing this Escape horror game.
Piggy Escape Obby game is easy to play you just have to run and hide as many as you can by avoiding Scary Piggy on your way to get Exit.
